A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie in the franchise.  There were so many gaps it was unbelievable.  The characters had no connection.  The story line was weak and boring at times.  Keep in mind I'm a big time Star Wars fan.  Sure\, the effects were amazing but movie felt forced (no pun intended).  Don't believe me?  Just watch the first scene when Luke meets Rey.  I won't give it away but notice what he does with the lightsaber.  Why? why? why?  A true Jedi would never do that.  Horrible movie!!
